Title: Quick Tweet
Description: Quick Tweet is a Windows desktop application that allows you to quickly write tweets. In any moment you need only to click an icon in the notify area and you will be ready to write you messages!
HomeWiki:
Quick Tweet

Quick Tweet is a Windows desktop application that allows you to quickly write tweets. In any moment you need only to click an icon in the notify area and you will be ready to write you messages!

Quick Tweet is a .NET 4.0 WPF Application that uses the following libraries:

  • WPF NotifyIcon
  • Twitterizer
  • JSON.NET
  • Html Agility Pack
  • Extended WPF Toolkit

Thanks to Double-J Desing for the application icon.
